name: Skedaddle
description:
Solve the games in each room and try to escape with the golden monkey.

Inspired by "The Crystal Maze" and "Indiana Jones" movies.

Physics based puzzle game.

pre-Alpha up for testing 8 challenging puzzle rooms.

Bird's eye view riddles - Geometry brain teasers - code breaking - marble run - physical agility - Very hard.!

It is best to take your time and think before you move. 

Have fun! 

Good luck!
